text:
@DerbysPolice @DerPolDroneUnit https://t.co/iIQIf2n7Yu

Driving to Peak District is NOT staying local/essential. Derbyshire is full of alternative green space.

I have 2 young 👧🏼👱🏻‍♀️and local national parks too, but I have to 🚗 there, so we’re sticking to where we can go ON FOOT.

PLEASE #StayHomeSaveLives
